responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Path Traversal in Michelin Copy To Slave Plugin
    analysis: |
      The `CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper` allows specifying a path, relative to
      the Jenkins master's filesystem root, to copy files from.
      This path is specified in the `CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.somewhereElsePath`
      configuration option, and is later used to construct a `FilePath`
      without any sanitization.

      An attacker able to control the `CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.somewhereElsePath`
      value can read arbitrary files from the Jenkins master's filesystem by
      creating a job with a `CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper` that specifies a path
      outside of the Jenkins directory.
    cwe: CWE-22
    function_names:
      - com.michelin.cio.hudson.plugins.copytoslave.CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.setUp
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/michelin/cio/hudson/plugins/copytoslave/CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.java
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: Path Traversal in Michelin Copy To Slave Plugin
leads.analysis:
The CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper allows specifying a path, relative to
the Jenkins master's filesystem root, to copy files from.
This path is specified in the CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.somewhereElsePath
configuration option, and is later used to construct a FilePath
without any sanitization.

An attacker able to control the CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper.somewhereElsePath
value can read arbitrary files from the Jenkins master's filesystem by
creating a job with a CopyToSlaveBuildWrapper that specifies a path
outside of the Jenkins directory.
